::Prowl::

Prowl frowns, listening to Epyon's proposal. He really didn't think 
it was a good idea. Prowl looks at Epyon.

"I don't think that would be a good idea. Most of the bots on the 
Maximal team were designed for either land or arial combat, and we'd 
have a much harder time fighting in water. And if its too far 
underwater, we'd need to wear suits or else the pressure would crush 
our superstructures."

Prowl frowns as he considers something. "And besides, torpedos are 
easier to carry into battle than portable missiles. If we were 
attacked at an underwater base, the enemy could arrive carrying 
dozens of torpedos."

He looks around, getting an idea. "Instead, we could salvage your 
ship and improve the Cybertronian Fire here. If that's allright with 
you, Commander."

Prowl looks over at Iron Raptor. He was used to being main adviser to 
Striker, and he hoped Iron Raptor would value his advice as well.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He walked up to Iron Raptor.
> "Madam Commander, I have a proposal to make. With the Cybertronian 
Fire
> nearly destroyed, I think it would be a good idea to salvage what is
> possible and merge it with mybase. Between whats left of the CF and 
the
> Star Jumper, we could build a under water city base. It would be 
more
> defendable, do to the fact that enemys would have to fight under 
water.
> What do you say?"
